> OOC: I wasn't mocking you, I just wanted to make sure you read the 
post.
> ALso, I already asked Robo Rick about it, and he said that after you
> blew me away with the water, then you guys followed, and we were far
> enough away from the base then.

(Sigh...I know you weren't mocking me, that's why I had the :) 
there...and okay, away from the beam.  I've missed about 5000 posts 
so I THINK the Decepticons are retreating but I'm not sure)

The Protectobots:

Hot Spot watched the Decepticons start to back off and headed towards 
the other Protectobots.

Groove felt something hit the top of his form, "Hey!" he yelled as he 
reverted to his biped form, not noticing the friendly fire that was 
heading for his back.

Blades let out a yell as his rocket that had been heading for 
Spasstik struck Groove square in the back, sending him tumbling 
forward to the ground, not moving.  "Slag..." he cursed as he began 
to power down, descending towards Groove's position.

Streetwise fired off a few pot shots at the retreating Decepticons, 
but none of them would've hit.  "Lousy 'Cons!" he yelled as he jogged 
over toward Groove.  "Groove!  You alright?"

First Aid let out a yell as he watched Groove crash down near him.  
He quickly activated his welding laser and began to work on 
Groove.  "Hang in there Groove, it isn't that bad, I promise."
